physical_appearance: The image shows a cross that is lying on top of a red cloth. All four vertical and horizontal arms are of equal length. There are four round blue jewels, each on one end of the cross. At the centre of the cross, a round red jewel is embedded. There is a handle attached to the side of the cross facing south.
